Flow.description: Create Task when an Opportunity is tagged as Assessment Done and Passed

value.stringValue: IF( OR( AND( ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].Account.SchoolOfInterest__c.Region__c , 'ME'), WEEKDAY(TODAY())=6 ), WEEKDAY(TODAY())=7 ), TODAY() +2, TODAY() +1 )

formulas.name: formula_7_myWaitEvent_myWait_myRule_6_event_0_SA1_1367836266
formulas.expression: IF( OR( AND( ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Account.SchoolOfInterest__r.Region__c} , 'ME'), WEEKDAY(TODAY())=6 ), WEEKDAY(TODAY())=7 ), TODAY() +2, TODAY() +1 )

Flow.label: OPP_AfterChildAssessment
